name: NEXGENT
description:
We can provide you with the skills, experience  and knowledge you need to skyrocket through the ranks of the IT industry faster than anyone even if you have zero experience right now.  

Our job-ready training program (which is based on our thorough experience working at Cisco, Dimension Data, Arista, etc. and as IT instructors for the  U.S. Air Force) and and in-person certification will help you master the most in-demand networking skills in 2-5 months so that you can break into a tech job or get promoted. 

Additionally, we provide 1:1 live mentorship from some of the best engineers in the world, skills assessment, career guidance and a proven system that can help you prioritize and execute your career plans confidently.  

Apply to our program here: http://zerotoengineer.com
and/or 
learn more here: http://help.nexgent.com

You will be guided through the most important foundational concepts and technical skills necessary to get started with full-stack networking. This robust training program provides students with a foundation of the most important concepts and skills to prepare for a career in cybersecurity.

A comprehensive training program designed to equip you with the fundamental skills and knowledge required to excel in the field. This course provides an in-depth understanding of DevOps principles, practices, and tools, including Ansible, Docker, Terraform, and Jenkins.

# **Get Certified Hands-On Tech Skills And the proper certificatIONS**
That way, you can apply to jobs and have actual experience.

Follow a structured curriculum with built-in assessments and real-world portfolio projects.
![](https://ngt.academy/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/badge.png)
# **OUR JOB GUARANTEE**
NGT Academy is committed to your success. We guarantee that upon completing our program, you will land a job in tech.
If you do not land a job within one year of graduation, we will refund your tuition. To be eligible for a refund, certain requirements must be met, including active participation in the program and diligent job search efforts.
# Get Placed In Your First Job in Tech GUARANTEED
Get matched with a Career Advisor to help you create a plan that will help you land a $10k+/mo IT career.

# **YOUR JOURNEY HERE AT NGT ACADEMY**
### Career discovery
Discover the right tech career path for you with your Career Advisor.
### We help you get a job
Help you land a job with our unique job-recruiting process and CONTINUE to work with you â€“ training you, mentoring you, and helping you get promoted to make $10,000 â€“ $20,000/mo in I.T.

Take you through our military-grade training to give you ALL the hands-on skills & experience you need to work in I.T.
### WEEKLY LIVE INSTRUCTION

Receive personalized guidance to craft a standout resume and LinkedIn profile that attract top employers in the tech industry.

Our Career Success Lessons cover essential topics to help you navigate the job market and achieve long-term success.
##### Interview Mastery
Our experts provide you with strategies, mock interviews, and feedback to help you confidently tackle any interview scenario.
##### JOB PLACEMENT ASSISTANCE
Receive dedicated support to help you land your dream job, including connections with top employers and job search strategies.

# Our Military Grade Approach
Our curriculum is developed by prior IT instructors and veterans from the U.S. Air Force. Following a skills-first and project-based learning approach, we built our programs with a similar format to how we trained in the military.
Meaning you gain actionable real-world skills, build out robust lab environments, roll out capstone projects, and perform skills qualification checks along the way.
This makes you attractive to employers because youâ€™ll have the EXPERIENCE on your resume.
This is the same training style we developed in the military, while preparing thousands of soldiers to support mission-critical network infrastructures in just 4 months.
And we donâ€™t just stop at education. We ensure you get a job in IT after you graduate. Guaranteed.

#### Best Jobs
7 of the 10 top tech jobs are IT and cybersecurity
# GI-BILL APPROVED WITH IAU
![](https://ngt.academy/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/IAU.png)
[![](https://ngt.academy/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/IAU.jpg)](https://ngt.academy/<https:/iaula.edu/approved-veteran-training-cybersecurity-and-network-engineering/>)

Veterans may use their G.I. Bill to pay for their tuition, reinforcing NGT Academyâ€™s commitment to supporting those who have served our country.

# Our Military Grade Approach
Our curriculum is developed by prior IT instructors and veterans from the U.S. Air Force. Following a skills-first and project-based learning approach, we built our programs with a similar format to how we trained in the military.
Meaning you gain actionable real-world skills, build out robust lab environments, roll out capstone projects, and perform skills qualification checks along the way.
This makes you attractive to employers because youâ€™ll have the EXPERIENCE on your resume.
This is the same training style we developed in the military, while preparing thousands of soldiers to support mission-critical network infrastructures in just 4 months.
And we donâ€™t just stop at education. We ensure you get a job in IT after you graduate. Guaranteed.

**NEXGENT - A Pathway to Your IT Career**  

Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinatorâ€™s W18 batch, NEXGENT is based in San Jose, California. With a dedicated team of around 25 employees, their mission is straightforward: to equip you with the skills necessary to thrive in the IT industry, whether you're starting from scratch or looking to advance your career.

### What They Offer

NEXGENT has carved a niche in the tech education landscape with its intensive, job-ready training programs. Drawing from their extensive experience at tier-one tech companies like Cisco and as IT instructors for the U.S. Air Force, they've engineered a curriculum that promises mastery of in-demand networking skills within just 2 to 5 months. This isn't theory; itâ€™s focused, hands-on training designed to prepare you for real-world IT roles.

**Key Features of NEXGENT:**
- **Job-Ready Training Programs:** Tailored to fast-track your entry or progression in tech.
- **1:1 Mentorship:** Weekly sessions with seasoned engineers who provide personalized guidance.
- **Skill Assessments and Career Coaching:** Identify your strengths and navigate your job search confidently.
- **Job Guarantee:** If you donâ€™t land a job within a year of graduation, you get your money backâ€”provided you actively participate in the program.

Their programs include specialized tracks like the Full Stack Network Engineer (FSNE) and Cybersecurity Accelerator as well as a focus on Cloud and DevOps. They also cater to veterans, with GI Bill approval available for eligible programs.

### Why Choose NEXGENT?

- **Fast and Effective:** Transform your career in just four months, not four years.
- **Proven Success:** Thousands of students have successfully transitioned into tech jobs, often earning between $10K and $30K a month.
- **Real-World Experience:** Benefit from military-grade training methodologies, ensuring you not only learn but also apply your skills effectively.
  
In an industry hungry for talentâ€”3.5 million unfilled cybersecurity jobs globallyâ€”NEXGENT stands out as an incubator for new tech professionals ready to make their mark.

### Get Involved

You can learn more or apply to their programs at [NEXGENT's website](https://ngt.academy) or check out their direct application portal [here](http://zerotoengineer.com). Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced professional looking to upskill, NEXGENT offers a compelling path to a successful tech career.
